ygData.subject: Re: Hello, Question for ya.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Duh trollies sells it in Grobb.  If yu is duh troll or duh ogre den yus go here.  If yus is dark elf der be place in duh Commons tew buy it, over bye duh
ygData.messageBody:
> Me too, could someone knowledgeable please post, or direct us "newbies" to a
> Smithing guide or Website that tells us things like where Ore and things can
> even be bought? So far, the only ore I've ever seen is in Freeport.

Duh trollies sells it in Grobb. If yu is duh troll or duh ogre den yus go
here. If yus is dark elf der be place in duh Commons tew buy it, over bye duh
bank and der is a forge der close tew.

~Krobuu

OOC - I have a question for all you seasoned smiths. I have been searching all
over to find the recipe to make small bricks. The books do not say and some of
the webpages I have seen say to combine (2) metal bits (seperated) with (1)
Flask of Water (not summoned) when I do this all three items are destroyed. Do
I have something wrong?

Did something change with a new patch or did this cobination never work? Sorry
if you have answered this already but around Oggok we hardly ever see a really
trained smith so I have no one in game to ask for guidance. Thank you in
advance.

~Krobuu
E'Ci and Vallon Zek
